Get a Head Start in the\nWorld of Inazuma Eleven!

■ Notice:
Early Access is now available!
The schedule is as follows:

■ Schedule (JST)
Start: November 11, 2025 - 00:00
End: November 13, 2025 - 23:59

■ Notice:
To all players who tried the Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road
demo, here's a guide to your special bonuses!

■ Content
- Played the demo
  Equipment: EXP Boots

- Won against the Alius Masters Bots (Godhood rank)
  Bond Object: Royal Academy Armored Vehicle

- Won against the Alius Masters Bots (Legendary Hero rank)
  Bond Object: Inazuma Tower

- Reached National rank in Ranked Match
  Spirit: <FUL:REIJI>

- Completed Chapter 1 in the Story Mode
  Bond Object: Muddy Football

■ How to Claim
1) Select "Information" from the Title Screen.
2) Choose "Claim Bonus Content."
3) Select your available bonuses to claim them.
*Only bonuses for which you meet the conditions will be displayed.

■ Notice
To apologize for the release date delay,
all players will receive the following:

■ Reward
Bond Object: Statue of <FUL:ENDO> (Giant)

■ How to Claim
1) Select "Information" from the Title Screen.
2) Choose "Claim Bonus Content."
3) Select your available rewards to claim them.

■ Notice
All players who pre-ordered the game
will receive the following rewards:

■ Rewards
Advanced Booster Bundle
Equipment: Bracelet of Victory
Kit: Dark Emperors Kit
Training Bean: Kick Strength Bean ×30
Training Bean: Finesse Bean ×30
Training Bean: Velocity Bean ×30
Training Bean: Toughness Bean ×30
Training Bean: Acuity Bean ×30
Training Bean: Steadfast Bean ×30
Training Bean: Intellect Bean ×30

■ How to Claim
1) Select "Information" from the Title Screen.
2) Choose "Claim Bonus Content."
3) Select your available rewards to claim them.
For Everyone Who\nPurchased the Deluxe Edition

■ Notice
All players who purchased the Deluxe Edition
will receive the following rewards:

■ Rewards
Choose-a-Character Crate
Bond Object: Football Club Room (Raimon)
Bond Object: Rai Rai Noodles (Inazuma Town)
Equipment: Promise Pendant
Goal Celebration: Victory Jump!

■ How to Claim
1) Select "Information" from the Title Screen.
2) Choose "Claim Bonus Content."
3) Select your available rewards to claim them.

■ Notice
The release date for Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road is as follows.
Until then, the game will be available via Early Access.

■ Release Date
November 13, 2025

■ Notice
To celebrate the release of Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road,
all players will receive the following rewards:

■ Rewards
Bond Star ×5
Victory Star ×10

■ How to Claim
1) Select "Information" from the Title Screen.
2) Choose "Claim Bonus Content."
3) Select your available rewards to claim them.

Major Update: Galaxy Route Coming Soon!

■ Notice
Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road is about to get even more exciting!
A major update is coming, bringing the Galaxy Route to Chronicle Mode,
as well as new characters, special moves, and many more additions!

■ Scheduled Update Date
December 22, 2025 (JST)
Galaxy Route Unlocked\nTake on Even Greater Challenges!
Galaxy Route unlocked in Chronicle Mode!

■ Notice
Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road just got even better!
The Galaxy Route has been unlocked in Chronicle Mode,
and many new additions, including new characters and special moves,
have been added to power up the game experience even further.
Jump in and try it now!

■ Update Details
https://www.inazuma.jp/victory-road/en/patchnote/
